responses: Hello! Welcome to our flower shop. How can I assist you today?

Greetings! How can I help brighten your day?
suggestions: Would you like to see some popular bouquets?

responses: Goodbye! Thanks for visiting our shop!
Have a great day!
See you soon! Feel free to come back anytime.
suggestions: Don't forget to check our website for special discounts.

responses: We have roses, tulips, lilies, and many more. What kind of flowers are you looking for?
Our selection includes sunflowers, daisies, and orchids. Any specific preferences?
You can choose from a variety of flowers like hydrangeas and peonies!
suggestions: Roses are perfect for anniversaries!
Tulips are great for spring celebrations.

patterns: What are the prices of your flowers?
responses: Our prices range from $10 to $100 depending on the bouquet size and flower type.
Bouquets start at $15, and we offer a range of prices based on your preferences.
You can get a basic bouquet for around $10. What size do you have in mind?
suggestions: Roses start at $15 per bouquet.
Tulips start at $20 per bouquet.

patterns: I want to place an order
responses: Sure! What flowers would you like to order?
Great choice! Can I have your delivery address?
Excellent! What size bouquet would you like to order?
suggestions: We can offer same-day delivery for local orders.
Do you want to add a card with your bouquet?

responses: We offer same-day delivery for local orders. Where would you like it sent?
Delivery is available within a 20-mile radius. Do you have an address in mind?
We can deliver flowers anywhere in the city. When do you need it?
suggestions: Don't forget to provide the delivery date!
Would you like to schedule a recurring delivery?

patterns: How do I care for my flowers?
responses: To keep your flowers fresh, trim the stems and change the water every few days.
Make sure to keep your flowers in a cool area away from direct sunlight.
A little sugar in the water can help your flowers last longer!
suggestions: Would you like to know about flower food?
Do you have specific flowers in mind for care tips?

responses: For weddings, we recommend elegant white roses or vibrant peonies.
Anniversaries are perfect for classic red roses. What do you think?
For birthdays, cheerful sunflowers and colorful mixed bouquets work well!

responses: I recommend our mixed bouquet for a touch of color! Would you like to see it?
If you like vibrant colors, our tropical flowers are a hit!
For a classic choice, you can't go wrong with our dozen roses.
